title: My First Blog Post
content: Welcome to my first blog post! This is just a sample post to demonstrate how you can write and format your blog content using HTML.

title: Introduction to Axolotls
content: In this post, we'll explore the fascinating world of axolotls and learn about their unique characteristics and behaviors.

title: Axolotls in Captivity
content: Learn how to properly care for axolotls in captivity, including tank setup, feeding, and maintenance tips.
